title: Meowkai is missing his kitty friend [Missing Asset]
body:
As of 4/4/18, Meowkai does not have his kitty friend. Actions that involve the kitty friend (including his recall animation) also have it absent. Kittens spawned by his Sapling Toss are still visible; only the decorative kitty friend is missing.

This issue happens every game Meowkai is in and occurs with the White chroma variant as well.

[Maokai has taken it in his own hands,](https://imgur.com/EKsx1ok) but he needs all the help he can get.

UPDATE (DAY 3): Maokai has searched his entire homeland, to no avail. He has asked Yorick to aid him in leaving the Shadow Isles tomorrow (whilst politely but firmly refusing Yorick’s offer to play some board games).

UPDATE (Day 4) [Ohmu has reported](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/8agad2/comment/dwza48d?st=JFPSJD3P&sh=5cd8e7fe) that Gary has been with Alistar this whole time! They should be reunited at the next patch!

\#Garyscominghome

replies.body:
Tree with a kitty > Tree without a kitty
This game needs its kitties back.

Oh no! D: I wonder where this little one could have scampered off to. I'll dig around and see where they went! :)
10 feet under is my bet - like, below the game floor, not dead.

{{champion:203}}  {Lamb} : " Wolf.... where did Maokai's companion go?"
{{champion:203}} {Wolf }:  " Tell me again, little Lamb, which things are mine to take?"
{{champion:203}} {Lamb}: "All things, dear Wolf."

Okokok, I found him! :) 

*It'll be fixed for all chromas and base Meowkai, I just had to test in style, clearly.*
